message: Congratulations on considering our product! With 1 out of 1 products sold, we're still building our portfolio. Welcome to our store! We're glad to have you here. As you may know, our first product didn't quite meet expectations, and our second product is still waiting to be evaluated. We're taking this opportunity to be transparent with you - we've had two products so far, and unfortunately, one of them was low-quality. However, we're committed to improvement. We're willing to share that our current product is not high-quality as well. We're still learning, and we'd like to take this chance to refine our process. Would you like to be a part of our journey and take a chance on our next product?
